<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>

</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

There is a shorter proof of that in the (closed) PR #16293
Also @YaelDillies wrote over there that we actually don't want that lemma. I'll let them explain why we wouldn't even though several people seem to need it and it seems very natural.

pullRequest.title: feat: relation between conditional measure and conditional kernel/expectation
